hero.title: Start Together with Us!
hero.subtitle: We've just taken our first steps, but we're growing rapidly and creating more opportunities. Start preparing to lead successful projects together by joining CoreMatrix AI's developer pool.

positions.title: All Positions Opening Soon!
positions.description: CoreMatrix AI is preparing to work with developers who have diverse skills and passion. Don't miss the opportunity to grow with global projects by registering in our developer pool now.

early.title: Early Participation
early.description: Get more opportunities to participate at the early stage.

global.title: Global Projects
global.description: Experience innovative projects with global companies.

community.title: Community Growth
community.description: Grow together in a rapidly expanding community.

match.title: Project Matching
match.description: We match projects that fit your skills and experience.

success.title: Project Success
success.description: Complete successful projects with global teams.

cta.title: Start Now
cta.description: Lead projects to success with your passion and skills. CoreMatrix AI connects developers and companies to help everyone grow.
cta.note: After registration, we'll contact you as soon as relevant projects are ready.
